title: Bug 11280 - Switching perspectives loses view maximized state
description: The bug report is missing a description.
OB: When switching perspectives, the CVS repository view loses its maximized state.
EB: The CVS repository view should remain maximized after switching perspectives.
SR:
1. Open the CVS repository view. 
2. Maximize the CVS repository view. 
3. Switch to a different perspective. 
4. Observe that the CVS repository view is no longer maximized.
